books.description: The actress and filmmaker describes her eating disorders and difficult relationship with her mother. Read by the author. 6 hours, 25 minutes unabridged.
books.title: I'M GLAD MY MOM DIED

books.author: Elliot Page
books.description: The Oscar-nominated star details discovering himself as a trans person and navigating abuse in Hollywood. Read by the author. 8 hours, 23 minutes unabridged.
books.title: PAGEBOY

books.author: Matthew McConaughey
books.description: The Academy Award-winning actor shares snippets from the diaries he kept over 35 years. Read by the author. 6 hours, 42 minutes unabridged.
books.title: GREENLIGHTS

books.author: Robert F. Kennedy Jr
books.description: The anti-vaccine advocate gives his take on the former chief medical advisor to the president. Read by Bruce Wagner. 27 hours, 20 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE REAL ANTHONY FAUCI

books.author: Prince Harry
books.description: The Duke of Sussex details his struggles with the royal family, loss of his mother, service in the British Army and marriage to Meghan Markle. Read by the author. 15 hours, 39 minutes unabridged.
books.title: SPARE

books.author: Bessel van der Kolk
books.description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery. Read by Sean Pratt. 16 hours, 17 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE

books.author: David Grann
books.description: The survivors of a shipwrecked British vessel on a secret mission during an imperial war with Spain have different accounts of events. Read by Dion Graham and the author. 8 hours, 28 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE WAGER

books.author: Hadley Vlahos
books.description: A hospice nurse shares some of her most impactful experiences and questions some of society's beliefs around end-of-life care. Read by the author. 7 hours, 20 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE IN-BETWEEN

books.author: David Grann
books.description: The story of a murder spree in 1920s Oklahoma that targeted Osage Indians, whose lands contained oil. The fledgling F.B.I. intervened, ineffectively. Read by Will Patton, Ann Marie Lee and Danny Campbell. 9 hours, 45 minutes unabridged.
books.title: KILLERS OF THE FLOWER MOON

books.author: Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.contributor: by Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.description: Applying the principles of Navy SEALs leadership training to any organization. Read by the authors. 8 hours, 15 minutes unabridged.
books.title: EXTREME OWNERSHIP

books.author: Michelle Obama
books.description: The former first lady shares personal stories and the tools she uses to deal with difficult situations. Read by the author. 10 hours unabridged.
books.title: THE LIGHT WE CARRY

books.author: Andy Cohen
books.description: The host and executive producer of “Watch What Happens Live” juggles fatherhood and his career. Read by the author. 10 hours, 32 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE DADDY DIARIES

books.author: Viola Davis
books.description: The multiple award-winning actress describes the difficulties she encountered before claiming her sense of self and achieving professional success. Read by the author. 9 hours, 15 minutes unabridged.
books.title: FINDING ME

books.author: Bruce D. Perry and Oprah Winfrey
books.contributor: by Bruce D. Perry and Oprah Winfrey
books.description: An approach to dealing with trauma that shifts an essential question used to investigate it. Read by the authors. 8 hours, 27 minutes unabridged.
books.title: WHAT HAPPENED TO YOU?

books.author: Rick Rubin with Neil Strauss
books.contributor: by Rick Rubin with Neil Strauss
books.title: THE CREATIVE ACT

books.author: Ramit Sethi
books.title: I WILL TEACH YOU TO BE RICH, SECOND EDITION

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: The 11th book in the Dog Man series. Piggy returns and the Supa Buddies are sabotaged.
books.title: TWENTY THOUSAND FLEAS UNDER THE SEA

books.author: Rachel Smythe
books.description: As gossip about them swirls, Persephone and Hades choose to take a break to focus on their own issues.
books.title: LORE OLYMPUS, VOL. 4

books.author: FGTeeV.
books.contributor: by FGTeeV. Illustrated by Miguel Díaz Rivas
books.description: The FGTeeV family encounter a T-Rex, a knight and angry space invaders.
books.title: FGTEEV: OUT OF TIME!

books.description: The fourth book in the Cat Kid Comic Club series. After doing their chores, baby frogs work together to create more mini-comics.

books.author: Ann M. Martin.
books.contributor: by Ann M. Martin. Illustrated by Cynthia Yuan Cheng
books.description: The 13th book in the Baby-sitters Club graphic novel series. Mary Anne receives a bad-luck charm in the mail with instructions to wear it.
books.title: MARY ANNE'S BAD LUCK MYSTERY

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: The ninth book in the Dog Man series. After turning in his badge, the canine cop is determined not to just roll over.
books.title: GRIME AND PUNISHMENT

books.contributor: by Akira Toriyama. Illustrated by Toyotarou
books.description: As new threats become known, Goku and his friends must defend the planet again.
books.title: DRAGON BALL SUPER, VOL. 18

books.description: After his mother dies, a young filmmaker meets a mysterious girl who takes his life in new directions.
books.title: GOODBYE, ERI

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: The 10th book in the Dog Man series. Can the power of love overcome the darkness and despair created by new villains?
books.title: MOTHERING HEIGHTS

books.author: Koyoharu Gotouge
books.description: A young charcoal seller must avenge his family by destroying the demon that slaughtered them.
books.title: DEMON SLAYER: KIMETSU NO YAIBA, VOL. 1

books.description: The seventh book in the Dog Man series. A new villain has a bone to pick with Dog Man while Petey the Cat starts a new life.
books.title: FOR WHOM THE BALL ROLLS

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: The eighth book in the Dog Man series. Petey the Cat feels better after getting out of jail but Li’l Petey struggles to find good in the world.
books.title: FETCH-22

books.author: Tui T. Sutherland.
books.contributor: by Tui T. Sutherland. Illustrated by Mike Holmes
books.description: The sixth book in the Wings of Fire graphic novel series; adapted by Barry Deutsch and Rachel Swirsky.

books.contributor: by Tui T. Sutherland. Illustrated by Mike Holmes
books.description: The first book in the Wings of Fire graphic book series. Five dragonets spring into action to fulfill their destiny.
books.title: THE DRAGONET PROPHECY

books.author: Jerry Craft
books.description: Jordan Banks, an artistically inclined seventh grader from Washington Heights, has a tough time navigating an upscale private school where diversity is low and maintaining his neighborhood friendships.
books.title: NEW KID

books.author: John Grisham
books.description: Three novellas: “Homecoming,” “Strawberry Moon” and “Sparring Partners.”
books.title: SPARRING PARTNERS

books.author: Danielle Steel
books.description: Parents of children who have gone missing on a dangerous peak in Montana form a search-and-rescue mission.
books.title: THE CHALLENGE

books.author: Liane Moriarty
books.description: The Delaney siblings suspect their father of causing the disappearance of their mother.
books.title: APPLES NEVER FALL

books.author: Nora Roberts
books.description: Two thrillers: “The Art of Deception” and “Risky Business.”
books.title: DANGER ZONE

books.author: Lisa Jackson
books.description: Called to investigate a murder, the New Orleans detective Reuben Montoya discovers that the victim — found on a cathedral altar in a yellowed bridal gown — is an old high school friend.
books.title: DEVIOUS

books.author: William W. Johnstone and J.A. Johnstone
books.contributor: by William W. Johnstone and J.A. Johnstone
books.description: The fifth book in the Smoke Jensen Novel of the West series. Jensen goes after the outlaws who attacked his friend.
books.title: DESOLATION CREEK

books.author: James Patterson and Bill Clinton
books.contributor: by James Patterson and Bill Clinton
books.description: Matthew Keating, a past president and former Navy SEAL, goes on his own to find his abducted teenage daughter.
books.title: THE PRESIDENT'S DAUGHTER

books.description: The 21st book in the Scot Harvath series. The American spy faces dangers on a mission in an unfamiliar culture.
books.title: RISING TIGER

books.contributor: by James Patterson and Richard DiLallo
books.description: A marketing executive becomes pregnant as wealthy women go missing.
books.title: THE NINTH MONTH

books.author: Brian Freeman
books.description: The 17th book in the Jason Bourne series. An assassin targets Bourne’s former lover.
books.title: ROBERT LUDLUM'S THE BOURNE SACRIFICE

books.author: Graham Brown
books.description: The 19th book in the NUMA Files series. A search for lost treasure puts Kurt Austin and Joe Zavala in the middle of a cyber-war.
books.title: CLIVE CUSSLER'S DARK VECTOR

books.author: Ron Carr
books.description: An empty nester discovers her late husband was keeping secrets when she attends his memorial service.
books.title: A FAMILY AFFAIR

books.author: James Patterson and James O. Born
books.contributor: by James Patterson and James O. Born
books.description: The 13th book in the Michael Bennett series. An assassin killing a number of women might disrupt the detective’s wedding plans.
books.title: THE RUSSIAN

books.description: The former military investigator Jack Reacher searches for a gunman who has killed five people and thrown a heartland city into a state of terror.

books.description: The 62nd book in the Stone Barrington series. Stone meets a socialite with ties to a nefarious enemy.

books.title: THE LITTLE MERMAID LIVE ACTION NOVELIZATION
